this_title: The Magic of Music, Nature, & the Future
introduction: Yo-Yo Ma, cellist and world-renowned musician, joins Zane Lowe in New York for a cup of coffee and a meaningful conversation.The conversation concludes by touching on his thoughts about the magic of music, his relationship with nature, and the dynamic he hopes to cultivate with younger generations through sharing knowledge.
chinese_title: The Magic of Music, Nature, & the Future
